title: Ep. 482 - Our Long National Nightmare
description:
Yesterday marked the first full day of President Trump’s impeachment trial. The trial consisted of House impeachment managers talking. And talking. And talking, and talking, and talking. Twelve hours of talking. And I was up watching until the very last minute so you wouldn’t have to. That’s my service to the American public. We will examine the most important moments. Then, Hillary throws shade at Bernie, President Trump wrecks the weak elites at Davos, and we announce a fun new project…

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at dailywire.com/Knowles
